D

DB_AddGroup(Group) - Method in class com.example.mapnector.FirebaseCommunication.FirebaseGroupSystem
add the group created by CreateGroupSystem to the list of groups in firebase
DB_addSearchListener(String) - Method in class com.example.mapnector.FirebaseCommunication.FirebaseGroupSystem
add listener to all groups that their name is the parameter; its made so we can view all groups that user types in edtSearch in left listView
DB_changeMineLocation() - Method in class com.example.mapnector.FirebaseCommunication.FirebaseLocationSystem
set new latitude and longitude values in my location in firebase; values taken from public static variables of MapManager.class
DB_changeName(String) - Method in class com.example.mapnector.FirebaseCommunication.FirebaseGroupSystem
we change the name in the Users table of the current user and in groupUsers table of each group in firebase; we don't touch chat system and mails so they will remain with the old name(but this will work because all the actions are done by user uid and not name, for example reply mail done via uid)
DB_clearAllGroupsWithMineLocationAccess() - Method in class com.example.mapnector.FirebaseCommunication.FirebaseLocationSystem
iterate through 'groupsAccessMyLocation' and put false in 'allowAccessLoc' in firebase; none can view my location after this function
DB_giveLeadership(GroupUser) - Method in class com.example.mapnector.FirebaseCommunication.FirebaseGroupSystem
make the groupUser leader of the group, and me a participant; send to that guy a mail that he got leadership
DB_groupMineLocationAccess(boolean) - Method in class com.example.mapnector.FirebaseCommunication.FirebaseLocationSystem
sets data about allowing/not allowing accessing my location to current group(ADmanager.lastSelectedGroup) dependent on parameter
DB_InitCurrentUser() - Method in class com.example.mapnector.FirebaseCommunication.FirebaseGroupSystem
we retrieve current user data from firebase, and initialize references(DatabaseReference); we add listeners to groups that i participate in; we load the mails i have gotten so far; we add listeners to mine groupsPendingKick, groupsPendingJoin to leave/join them in case they aren't null in firebase; We init fms.
DB_joinGroup(String) - Method in class com.example.mapnector.FirebaseCommunication.FirebaseGroupSystem
join the group with 'groupKey' key - that means add myself to groupUsers list of that group, update the participant number, add the group to myGroups list; That function(with parameter) used when we need to add group by key from groupsPendingJoin, more often we use the function without params
DB_joinGroup() - Method in class com.example.mapnector.FirebaseCommunication.FirebaseGroupSystem
join the group ADmanager.lastSelectedGroup - that means add myself to groupUsers list of that group, update the participant number, add the group to myGroups list;
DB_kickUser(GroupUser) - Method in class com.example.mapnector.FirebaseCommunication.FirebaseGroupSystem
kick a groupUser from the group; for security stuff i decided that none except of the user can't view or update 'myGroups' table in firebase; so we add current group to groupsPendingKick of the groupUser and he will "kick himself" next time he restarts the app; data about user immediatly cleaned from group - but to clear data about the group from the user we will let the user do it by himself;
DB_leaveGroup(boolean) - Method in class com.example.mapnector.FirebaseCommunication.FirebaseGroupSystem
leave group that ADmanager.lastSelectedGroup; checks many "special cases" for example in case im leader and more than one participant is in the group i cant leave - must give someone leadership
DB_sendMail(String, FirebaseMailSystem.MAIL_TYPE) - Method in class com.example.mapnector.FirebaseCommunication.FirebaseMailSystem
one of 3 functions to send mails to some user in firebase; this one is used often by mails that aren't involving the user
DB_sendMail(Mail) - Method in class com.example.mapnector.FirebaseCommunication.FirebaseMailSystem
One of the 3 functions to send mail; here we send one mail to all groupUsers of some group; used often by leaders who want to send one mail to all group members(without the leader himself of course)
DB_sendMail(String, Mail) - Method in class com.example.mapnector.FirebaseCommunication.FirebaseMailSystem
One of the 3 functions to send mail; send mail to a specific groupUser; the mail created via CreateGroupSystem;
DB_UpdateGroup(String, String, String) - Method in class com.example.mapnector.FirebaseCommunication.FirebaseGroupSystem
update group data in firebase; called after the btnCreateGroup of the dialog clicked; we change only the description and the state of the group
DB_updateUsersLocations(HashMap<String, FirebaseLocationSystem.DoubleDoubleName>) - Method in class com.example.mapnector.FirebaseCommunication.FirebaseLocationSystem
we pass the HashMap from 'MapManager.class' and fill it there; we retrieve new users locations (that allow us access it) and create objects of DoublDobuleName to store and show info later; if we don't have color for marker of that user generate random color(call getRandomMarkerColor)
description - Variable in class com.example.mapnector.DBStorage.Group
 
dialogVal - Variable in class com.example.mapnector.GroupManagement.CreateGroupSystem
 
disableDialog() - Method in class com.example.mapnector.GroupManagement.CreateGroupSystem
 
disableGroupListeners() - Method in class com.example.mapnector.FirebaseCommunication.FirebaseGroupSystem
remove group listeners to groups im participating in
disableMailListener() - Method in class com.example.mapnector.FirebaseCommunication.FirebaseMailSystem
 
disablePendingGroupsListeners() - Method in class com.example.mapnector.FirebaseCommunication.FirebaseGroupSystem
remove listeners for groupsPendingKick, groupsPendingJoin.
disableSearchListener() - Method in class com.example.mapnector.FirebaseCommunication.FirebaseGroupSystem
remove listeners for all groups with name 'lastSearch'
DoubleDoubleName(double, double, String) - Constructor for class com.example.mapnector.FirebaseCommunication.FirebaseLocationSystem.DoubleDoubleName
 
drawMapData() - Method in class com.example.mapnector.MapManagement.MapManager
handler calls this function(and MapsActivity in some specific cases to not wait 5 seconds before showing data); we iterate the hashMap the FirebaseLocationSystem fills in and add markers to those locations in the googleMap(without marker to our own location)
